original_text: He ruled over all the kings around Israel, from the Euphrates river as far as the Philistines' country and the border of Egypt.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 유브라데 강에서부터 블레셋 땅과 애굽 지경까지의 모든 왕을 다스렸으며

sentences.original_text: He ruled over all the kings around Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘 주변의 모든 왕들을 다스렸다

sentences.original_text: as far as the Philistines' country
